articles.description: PUTRAJAYA (REUTERS, THE STAR/ASIA NEWS NETWORK) - Malaysia on Wednesday (May 26) reported 7,478 new coronavirus cases, its highest daily rise in infections since the start of the pandemic.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
